actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide family and medical leave to employees of the Federal Aviation Administration and the Transportation Security Administration, and for other purposes.
short_title: FAA and TSA Family and Medical Leave Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
FAA and TSA Family and Medical Leave Act

This bill revises the personnel management system of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to provide FAA employees, including Transportation Security Administration employees, the same family and medical leave benefits as other federal employees.
